item.description:
Join the ladies of the Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club for a fun cocktail party at the Emerald Lounge inside the Revere Hotel. Guests will enjoy delicious complimentary appetizers, signature cocktails, the famous pink carpet walk-off for the title of Best-in-Shoe, prizes and mingling with other shoe loving fashionistas. We'll also be enjoying a pink carpet fashion show featuring Smiling Stiletto members modeling the latest corsets from designer Troppabella. Also joining us will be pocketbook designer Tamara Handbags who will be showcasing some fabulous purses. Of course, there will be great shopping opportunities from both vendors!

Smiling Stiletto is a free social organization for shoe and fashion lovers with 2,700 members in the Boston area. Be sure to break out your sexy shoes for this fun event!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the Lounge- ask the hostess for the Smiling Stiletto group. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Ladies Night: Smiling Stiletto Cocktail Party at the Emerald Lounge
